name: Los Angeles Helicopter Flight
summary: Get the impression to really be over Los Angeles. Take that crazy 360 degree real helicopter flight over L.A. without leaving your home, even without leaving your couch!  You can see all perspectives from helicopter view over L.A. like in the blockbuster movies. Fly over all skyscrapers and take an awesome flight around the US Bank Tower, one big landmark of L.A. downtown.   Flight time: 21 minutes.
